docs.snippet: Chuck Colson and others discuss the governor's comparison of himself to King David.
docs.lead_paragraph: In his unending comments about his extramarital affair with a woman he met at a dance in Uruguay, Gov. Mark Sanford often includes spiritual references and talks of God's will. Last week, for example, he compared himself to King David, and this week he said that God wants him to stay in office. Jon Stewart and others have ridiculed him for these statements.
docs.abstract: Chuck Colson and others discuss the governor's comparison of himself to King David.

docs.snippet: Argentina's loss to Brazil at home on Saturday night was a blow to its World Cup hopes.
docs.lead_paragraph: The United States kept moving methodically toward the World Cup in South Africa, but Argentina's path took a turn for the worse with a 3-1 loss to Brazil in Rosario on Saturday night.
docs.abstract: Argentina's loss to Brazil at home on Saturday night was a blow to its World Cup hopes.
